channel.title: ::pnpc command
channel.description: how would i add a ::pnpc command to funscap3 source and where would i add it(client.java)?

item.title: ::pnpc command
item.dc:creator: @deamerdude deamerdude
item.description:
@deamerdude wrote:

ok u must add it in client.java, search any admin command like “banuser” or any other admin commands.

below the admin command put this

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

save then compile, cross your fingers and it will probably work! Lol

Read full topic

item.title: ::pnpc command
item.dc:creator: @Abcscape Abcscape
item.description:
@Abcscape wrote:

You need to find.

[center]if (command.equals[/center]

Then add it above that.
